alert.note: Alert for Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN HARRISON...PANOLA...RUSK...SOUTHEASTERN GREGG AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 221 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Marshall to near Pinehill, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Longview, Henderson, Carthage, Tatum, Beckville, Elysian Fields, Joinerville, Pinehill, Minden, Lakeport, Easton, Gary City, Chapman, Monroe, Darco, Fairplay, Stewart, Brachfield, Chalk Hill and Dotson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Texas.
